template.description: Process Tweets Real Time using json
template.name: TwitterRealTime

config.comments: query reads the contents of json , to read attributes ${attrib}

entry.value: SELECT substring(tweet_created_at,27,4)||'-'||substring(tweet_created_at,5,3)||'-'||substring(tweet_created_at,9,2)||' '||substring(tweet_created_at,12,8) as tweet_created_at, tweet_id, tweet_id_str, text, source, user_id, user_id_str, name, screen_name, location, url, description, followers_count, friends_count, statuses_count, geo_enabled, time_zone, geo, coordinates, lang, timestamp_ms FROM FLOWFILE WHERE lower(text) like '%covid%'

SELECT substring(tweet_created_at,27,4)||'-'||substring(tweet_created_at,5,3)||'-'||substring(tweet_created_at,9,2)||' '||substring(tweet_created_at,12,8) as tweet_created_at, tweet_id, tweet_id_str, text, source, user_id, user_id_str, name, screen_name, location, url, description, followers_count, friends_count, statuses_count, geo_enabled, time_zone, geo, coordinates, lang, timestamp_ms FROM FLOWFILE WHERE lang='en'
